Package  Class  Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help

Package org.fundaciotapies.ac.rest

Class Summary
DeleteObject Call: http://{host:port}/objects/{class}/{id}/delete
Deletes referenced object
Params:
- class: Object class
- id: Object identifier
Returns "success" or "error"
GetClassesList Call: http://{host:port}/classes/list?
GetClassesTree Call: http://{host:port}/classes/tree?
GetInsertObjectForm Call: http://{host:port}/classes/{class}/form
Get all fields and its types of given class
Params class: Class name
GetObject Call: http://{host:port}/object/{class}/{id}
Get fields and data of a specific object
Params
- class: Class name
- id: Object identifier
Returns: field-value pairs list in JSON
GetObjectFile Call: http://{host:port}/objects/{class}/{id}/file
Get media file linked to specific object.
GetObjectLegalColor Call: http://{host:port}/objects/{class}/{id}/color
Get legal color which is assigned to this object
Params class:
- class: Class name
- id: object identifier
Returns: HTML color code
GetRDF Call: http://{host:port}/rdf
Gets full RDF specification of current stored data
LegalNext Call: http://{host:port}/legal/next
While in legal process (after calling StartLegal function), call this function to get further legal forms which to show to user.
LegalRestoreData Call: http://{host:port}/legal/restore
While in legal process (after calling StartLegal function), you can get current legal context data calling this function.
Search Call: http://{host:port}/search
Basic global search which calls a string based query for all triplet contents.
SpecificObjectSearch Call: http://{host:port}/specific
Global search filtering by field-value pair.
StartLegal Call: http://{host:port}/legal/start
Starts a legal process.
UpdateObject Call: http://{host:port}/objects/{class}/{id}/update
Updates object data.
UploadObject Call: http://{host:port}/objects/{class}/{id}/upload
Uploads object.
UploadObjectFile Call: http://{host:port}/{class}/{id}/file/upload
Uploads and associates media file to specified object.
